text: Bloody Lunatic Asylum is the third studio album by the Italian gothic black metal band Theatres des Vampires. Track 11 is based on the Moonlight Sonata by Ludwig van Beethoven. == Track listing == == Line-Up == *Lord Vampyr − vocals, acoustic guitar *Necros − keyboards, sampler, backing vocals *Blutsauger − bass guitar *Incubus − guitars *Strigoi − guitars, acoustic guitar *Blasfemator − drums, backing vocals *Scarlet − female backing vocals *Justine − female backing vocals Category:Theatres des Vampires albums Category:2001 albums
title: Bloody Lunatic Asylum
